thread.section_title: Home Zone Furniture Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Home Zone Furniture | homezonefurniture.com | 2 of 135
thread.title: Rick
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Rick

author: Rick
title: Rick
text:
Staff greeted my wife and I as soon as we came in.
Let us shop without following us around.
Check in with us a couple of times to see if we had any questions.
Felt no pressure to buy.
Left and came back. We were greeted as we came back in. Manager filled out paperwork and got us approved. We were back out the door in about 20 minites.
